Verses: 1 ettaam Naalile Mose Aaronaiyum Avan Kumaararaiyum Isravelin Moopparaiyum Azhaiththu,

2 aaronai Nokki: Nee Paavanivaaranapaliyaagap Pazhudhatra Oru Kandrukkuttiyaiyum, Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaagap Pazhudhatra Oru Aattukkadaavaiyum Therindhukondu, Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Paliyidakkadavaai.

3 melum Isravel Puththirarai Nokki: Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Paliyidumpadikku, Neengal Paavanivaarana Paliyaagap Pazhudhatra Oru Vellaattuk Kadaavaiyum, Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaaga Oru Vayadhaana Pazhudhatra Oru Kandrukkuttiyaiyum, Oru Aattukkuttiyaiyum,
4 samaadhaanapaligalaaga Oru Kaalaiyaiyum, Oru Aattukkadaavaiyum, Enneyile Pisaindha Pojanapaliyaiyum Konduvaarungal; Indru Karththar Ungalukku Dharisanamaavaar Endru Sol Endraan.
5 mose Kattalaiyittavaigalai Avargal Aasarippuk Koodaaraththukku Munbaagak Konduvandhaargal. Sabaiyaar Ellaarum Serndhu, Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Nindraargal.
6 appozhudhu Mose: Karththar Kattalaiyitta Indhak Kaariyaththai Seyyungal; Karththarudaiya Magimai Ungalukkuk Kaanappadum Endraan.

7 mose Aaronai Nokki: Nee Palipeedaththandaiyil Serndhu, Karththar Kattalaiyittapadiye, Un Paavanivaarana Paliyaiyum Un Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaiyum Seluththi, Unakkaagavum Janangalukkaagavum Paavanivirththi Seydhu, Janangaludaiya Paliyaiyum Seluththi, Avargalukkaagavum Paavanivirththi Sey Endraan.
8 appozhudhu Aaron Palipeedaththandaiyil Serndhu, Than Paavanivaarana Paliyaagiya Kandrukkuttiyaik Kondraan.

9 aaronin Kumaarar Adhin Raththaththai Avanidaththil Konduvandhaargal; Avan Than Viralai Andha Raththaththil Thoiththu, Palipeedaththin Kombugalinmel Poosi, Matra Raththaththaip Palipeedaththin Adiyile Ootri,
10 paavanivaaranapaliyin Kozhuppaiyum, Kundikkaaigalaiyum, Kalleeralil Eduththa Javvaiyum, Karththar Mosekkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye, Palipeedaththinmel Thaganiththu,
11 maamsaththaiyum Tholaiyum Paalayaththukkup Purambe Akkiniyile Sutteriththaan.
12 pinbu Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaiyum Kondraan; Aaronin Kumaarar Adhin Raththaththai Avanidaththil Konduvandhaargal; Adhai Avan Palipeedaththinmel Sutrilum Theliththaan.
13 sarvaanga Thaganapaliyin Thundangalaiyum Thalaiyaiyum Avanidaththil Konduvandhaargal; Avan Avaigalaip Palipeedaththinmel Thaganiththu,
14 kudalgalaiyum Thodaigalaiyum Kazhuvi, Palipeedaththinmel Irundha Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyinmel Thaganiththaan.
15 pinbu Avan Janangalin Paliyaik Konduvandhu, Janangalin Paavanivirththikkuriya Vellaattukkadaavaik Kondru, Mundhinadhaip Paliyittadhupola, Adhaippaavanivaaranapaliyaakki,
16 sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaiyum Konduvandhu, Niyamaththinpadi, Adhaip Paliyittu,
17 pojanapaliyaiyum Konduvandhu, Adhil Kainiraiya Eduththu, Adhaik Kaalaiyil Seluththum Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyudane Palipeedaththinmel Thaganiththaan.

18 pinbu Janangalin Samaadhaanapaligalaagiya Kaalaiyaiyum Aattukkadaavaiyum Kondraan; Aaronin Kumaarar Adhin Raththaththai Avanidaththil Konduvandhaargal; Avan Adhaip Palipeedaththinmel Sutrilum Theliththu,
19 kaalaiyilum Aattukkadaavilum Eduththa Kozhuppaiyum, Vaalaiyum, Kudalgalai Moodiya Javvaiyum, Kundikkaaigalaiyum, Kalleeralinmel Irundha Javvaiyum Konduvandhu,
20 kozhuppai Maarkkandangalinmel Vaiththaargal; Andhak Kozhuppaip Palipeedaththinmel Thaganiththaan.
21 maarkkandangalaiyum Valadhu Munnanthodaiyaiyum, Mose Kattalaiyittapadiye, Aaron Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Asaivaattum Paliyaaga Asaivaattinaan.

22 pinbu Aaron Janangalukku Neraagath Than Kaigalai Uyarththi, Avargalai Aaseervadhiththu, Thaan Paavanivaaranapaliyaiyum, Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaiyum, Samaadhaanapaligalaiyum Seluththina Idaththilirundhu Iranginaan.
23 pinbu Moseyum Aaronum Aasarippuk Koodaaraththukkul Pravesiththu, Veliye Vandhu, Janangalai Aaseervadhiththaargal; Appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Magimai Sagala Janangalukkum Kaanappattadhu.

24 andriyum Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyilirundhu Akkini Purappattu, Palipeedaththinmel Irundha Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaiyum Kozhuppaiyum Eriththuvittadhu; Janangalellaarum Adhaik Kandapodhu Aaravaariththu Mugankuppura Vizhundhaargal.
